name: Oceans Edge Exclusive Benefits
short_description: Book directly on our website and you’ll save up to 25%—with your first cocktail on us!
short_description_detail_page: Book directly here on our website and you’ll receive our best offer: Save up to 25% on your stay and enjoy your first cocktail on us!
description:
BOOK THIS OFFER AND ENJOY:

  • Tropically inspired elegant accommodations
  • 2 welcome cocktails
  • Complimentary 2-hour kayak, paddleboard, or bicycle rental
  • Shuttle service to Key West Historic Seaport (downtown)
  • Personalized in-room entertainment via 49-inch Smart TV
  • Access to Digital Concierge services
  • Access to complimentary resort activities, 24-hour gym, and lawn games
  • Access to 6 heated pristine pools with poolside refreshment service
  • Access to a deep-water full marina with a variety of water activities
terms_conditions: Reservation is non-refundable and non-transferable. Daily rates are subject to taxes, fees, and nightly resort fee of $37 plus tax. on-site parking is available for $20 per night plus tax per vehicle and parking space required. Restrictions and blackout dates may apply.
